parameters.description: valid access token from the Spotify Accounts service: see the [Web API Authorization Guide](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/general/guides/authorization-guide/) for details.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description:
An [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2). If a country code is specified, only shows and episodes that are available in that market will be returned.  
If a valid user access token is specified in the request header, the country associated with the user account will take priority over this parameter.  
*Note: If neither market or user country are provided, the content is considered unavailable for the client.*   
Users can view the country that is associated with their account in the [account settings](https://www.spotify.com/se/account/overview/).
parameters.name: market

parameters.description: The maximum number of episodes to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: The index of the first episode to return. Default: 0 (the first object). Use with limit to get the next set of episodes.
parameters.name: offset
